builds.name: Generic ADC Build
builds.description: Standard ADC build focused on maximizing auto-attack damage through attack speed, attack power, and penetration. Strong early sustain with Death's Embrace, building into a powerful late-game boxing build.

itemNotes.deaths-embrace: I just think its the best for most adcs
itemNotes.lernaean-bow: Big strength and attack speed + a strong active off the rip
itemNotes.dagger-of-frenzy: Now increase attack power (your auto's damage) and even more attack speed + another strong active for even more attack speed
itemNotes.odysseus-bow: Big bump in attack speed with a solid passive for wave clear. Can save your ability while clearing wave even
itemNotes.titans-bane: You need penetration by this point: must build in all adc builds
itemNotes.tyrfing: Strength + attack power + attack speed + amazing boxing passive
itemNotes.riptalon: Final bit of atk power + atk speed + sustain passive

builds.name: Generic Mid Build
builds.description: Standard Mid build focused on magical power scaling and burst damage. Conduit Gem for early wave clear, Book of Thoth for massive stacked damage, finishing with penetration and the highest magical power items in the game.

itemNotes.conduit-gem: I like this for early clearing and hits pretty hard late game
itemNotes.spear-of-desolation: Huge power spike with good passive
itemNotes.chronos-pendant: This is a flex slot. You go polynomicon, archmages gem, etc., but chronos is always a safe bet right now
itemNotes.obsidian-shard: Pen time: must build in all mage builds
itemNotes.rod-of-tahuti: Damage go boom: must build in all mage builds
itemNotes.soul-reaver: Good damage + good passive + adds to your thoth damage

builds.name: Generic Jungle Build
builds.description: Standard Jungle build focused on ability damage, cooldown reduction, and penetration. Bumba's Hammer for jungle clear and power, building into high damage with penetration to assassinate targets.

itemNotes.bumbas-hammer: Dagger is fine too. Read the passives
itemNotes.jotunns-revenge: Strength + cooldown + good passive + good price
itemNotes.oath-sworn-spear: Great power with amazing "flat pen" passive
itemNotes.tekko-kagi: Great power + cooldown + zoomies passive - hydras is great here if you can use auto attack canceling. Ask me for help or look up a vid for this
itemNotes.titans-bane: You need penetration by this point: must build in all jungle builds
itemNotes.heartseeker: Damage go boom: must build in jungle build
itemNotes.the-crusher: Strength + cooldown + extra dmg passive - can go blinking abyss here if you are confident in using your actives

builds.name: Generic Solo Build
builds.description: Balanced Solo build with sustain and protections. Works in most matchups. Bluestone for physical gods, building both magical and physical defense with sustain. Note: Build Breastplate of Valor before Genji's Guard if facing a physical solo laner.

itemNotes.bluestone-pendant: Strength + some sustain - Physical scaling gods
itemNotes.genjis-guard: Magical protection with cooldown and mana regen + cooldown passive for fights. You need to buy breastplate first if going against physical in solo
itemNotes.breastplate-of-valor: Same as genji's but physical protection. Build this first if facing physical solo laner
itemNotes.dwarven-plate: Big protection + active to add more protections to a specific dmg type
itemNotes.spirit-robe: Protections + passive for more protections and sustain when getting cc'd

builds.name: Generic Support Build
builds.description: Standard Support build focused on team utility and balanced protections. Heroism starter, building protections while enhancing team survivability. Strong sustain from Yogi's Necklace synergy with Stampede and Oni Hunter's Garb. Spectral Armor counters physical ADCs (use Spectral Visage vs magical ADCs).

itemNotes.stampede: Phys protections + speed active + adds to next item (yogis)
itemNotes.oni-hunters-garb: Magical protections + amazing passive + adds to yogis
itemNotes.spectral-armor: Physical protections + anti attack speed + anti crit - get spectral visage if adc is magical
itemNotes.shell-of-rebuke: Amazing relic for your team and allows you to have another relic (even another basic shell)
